snippet:
Flow ID: 
Page: 
Title: 
Description: Billing details form for users choosing to checkout as Guest or Register. Based on selection, additional registration fields appear. All required fields are marked as mandatory.
Variant: guest_checkout - User selects Guest Checkout. Displays mandatory fields for billing and shipping address.
---
Steps (Narrative):

---
Elements (Locators):
- Guest Checkout Option (select) | Locator: id = account-guest
- First Name (input) | Locator: name = firstname
- Last Name (input) | Locator: name = lastname
- Email (input) | Locator: name = email
- Telephone (input) | Locator: name = telephone
- Address (input) | Locator: name = address_1
- City (input) | Locator: name = city
- Postcode (input) | Locator: name = postcode
- Country (select) | Locator: name = country_id
- Region/State (select) | Locator: name = zone_id
- Shipping Address same as Billing (check) | Locator: name = shipping_address
- Continue Button (click) | Locator: id = button-guest

Flow ID: 
Page: 
Title: 
Description: Login page and also Handles the transition from cart to checkout. If the user is logged in, they are directed to the full checkout form. If not, a login form is shown alongside options for Guest Checkout and Registration.
Variant: user_not_logged_in - User is not logged in. Page displays login form and guest/register options.
---
Steps (Narrative):

---
Elements (Locators):
- Login Name (input) | Locator: name = loginname
- Password (input) | Locator: name = password
- Login Button (click) | Locator: xpath = //*[@id='loginFrm']/fieldset/button
- Guest Checkout Option (select) | Locator: id = account-guest
- Register New Account Option (select) | Locator: id = account-register
- Continue as Guest/Register (click) | Locator: css = #button-account

application_url : https://www.automationteststore.com/
Page ID: checkout_guest_registration_page
Page Name: Guest Checkout or Registration
Variant: guest_checkout
Variant Description: User selects Guest Checkout. Displays mandatory fields for billing and shipping address.

After Page(s): shipping_method_page

application_url : https://www.automationteststore.com/
Page ID: checkout_guest_registration_page
Page Name: Guest Checkout or Registration
Variant: register_account
Variant Description: User selects Register Account. Displays billing fields and extra fields for password and agreement.
Before Page(s): checkout_login_page
After Page(s): shipping_method_page
Tags: guest_checkout, registration, billing_details, user_info_form
---
Elements:
- Register Account Option (select) | Locator: id = account-register
- First Name (input) | Locator: name = firstname
- Last Name (input) | Locator: name = lastname
- Email (input) | Locator: name = email
- Telephone (input) | Locator: name = telephone
- Address (input) | Locator: name = address_1
- City (input) | Locator: name = city
- Postcode (input) | Locator: name = postcode
- Country (select) | Locator: name = country_id
- Region/State (select) | Locator: name = zone_id
- Password (input) | Locator: name = password
- Confirm Password (input) | Locator: name = confirm
- Agree to Terms Checkbox (check) | Locator: name = agree
- Continue Button (click) | Locator: id = button-register

application_url : https://www.automationteststore.com/
Page ID: checkout_login_page
Page Name: Checkout Entry Page
Variant: user_not_logged_in
Variant Description: User is not logged in. Page displays login form and guest/register options.
Before Page(s): cart_page
After Page(s): checkout_logged_in_page, checkout_guest_registration_page
Tags: checkout, account_gate, login_or_guest, authentication_entry
---
Elements:

- Password (input) | Locator: name = password
- Login Button (click) | Locator: id = button-login
- Guest Checkout Option (select) | Locator: id = account-guest
- Register New Account Option (select) | Locator: id = account-register
- Continue as Guest/Register (click) | Locator: css = #button-account
